# dputtruncat

The goal of dputtruncat is to ... demonstrate that dput output is truncated in some environments. 

## Example


```{r example}
library(dputtruncat)
## vector of characters
v <- dput_grist()
x <- setNames(runif(length(v), 1, 1000), v)

dput(x)
```

```{r}
devtools::session_info()
```
